definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: The winds that will be howling at all hours.
And if you look closely, this scene was almost taken up in the film Hero, well borrowed.
sentences.chinese: 这种事情无时无刻不在发生，这就是电影圈。

sentences.english: The sellers shouts could be heard every now and then.
sentences.chinese: 无时无刻都能听到商人的叫卖声。

sentences.english: We are in momentary expectation of the arrival of you.
sentences.chinese: 我们无时无刻不在盼望你的到来。

sentences.english: There, a child grows up under the everpresent attention of his parents .
sentences.chinese: 在那里孩子无时无刻不在父母的关怀下成长。

sentences.english: He showeth Himself at all times and in all places.
sentences.chinese: 他无时无刻，无处不在地显明自身。

sentences.english: That’s it - here you have the three wonderfully simple ways for you to be happy here and now. Don’t leave any of these steps for some later time.
sentences.chinese: 这就是让你无时无刻保持快乐的三个奇妙简单的理由。

sentences.english: Remember your motivation at all times.
sentences.chinese: 无时无刻记住你的动机。

sentences.english: To achieve happiness, we should make certain that we are never without an important goal.
sentences.chinese: 要得到幸福，就应当无时无刻不抱定一个重要目标。

sentences.english: I am very sensitive to the sun and need to have high protection at all times.
sentences.chinese: 我对阳光十分拙笨，是以需要无时无刻的高度防护。

sentences.english: Her seven eyes compassionately watch over sentient beings at all times.
sentences.chinese: 度母的七只眼睛无时无刻都在慈悲的观着所有众生。

sentences.english: There, a child grows up under the everpresent attention of his parents;
sentences.chinese: 荒凉地区的孩子无时无刻不在父母关怀下成长。

definition: wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
at any time/at all times/at the right time
